short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks ads on websites using a customizable list of domains and URLs. Enhances browsing experience by reducing unwanted content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sam Software Adblocker is a powerful and customizable ad-blocking extension designed to improve your browsing experience by filtering out unwanted ads and trackers. This extension allows you to maintain control over what gets blocked by letting you add or remove specific URLs and domains from the block list.

How to Use:

Open the Extension: Click on the Sam Software AdBlocker icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Add URLs to Block: Enter the URLs or domains you want to block and click "Add URL."
Manage Blocked URLs: View and remove blocked URLs from the "Blocked URLs" list as needed.
Enjoy a Cleaner Browsing Experience: Experience fewer ads and trackers while browsing.

Note: If changes don't appear immediately, please refresh the page or restart your browser.

For support or to report issues, please contact us at samsoftware75@gmail.com.

We are continuously working to improve our extension. If you encounter any functionality issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
